HORROR.engineDescription: Expresses horror themes through tone, mechanics, and emotional tension

horror_identity.label: Horror Identity
horror_identity.description: Explicit horror themes and recognizable genre conventions such as monsters, gore, and supernatural threats

resource_survival.label: Survival Tension
resource_survival.description: Fear reinforced by vulnerability, scarcity of resources, and pressure to survive under risk

psychological_horror.label: Psychological Horror
psychological_horror.description: Horror driven by mental disturbance, distorted perception, and emotional or existential dread

combat_engagement.label: Combat Engagement
combat_engagement.description: Direct confrontation with enemies through weapons, tools, and action-oriented combat systems

atmospheric_horror.label: Atmospheric Horror
atmospheric_horror.description: Horror conveyed through mood, environment, and sustained sensory tension

RUN-BASED.engineDescription: Structured around repeatable procedural runs and reset-driven progression loops

run_based_identity.label: Run-based Identity
run_based_identity.description: Explicit roguelike or roguelite identity expressed through run-focused structure and genre conventions

procedural_runs.label: Procedural Runs
procedural_runs.description: Gameplay sessions built from procedurally or semi-randomly generated layouts and encounters

permadeath_reset.label: Permadeath
permadeath_reset.description: Failure that triggers a full or near-full reset of the current run and its progress

run_variability.label: Run Variability
run_variability.description: Meaningful differences between runs through randomized builds, items, or evolving playstyles

meta_progression.label: Meta Progression
meta_progression.description: Persistent progression systems that carry unlocks or upgrades across multiple runs
